script.name: al.Phanon.Main
script.description: LitQB's Phanon Corporation: Main AL Plugin

line.comment: * Wait to be sure that the game knows where we are and that the galaxy is initialized.
* Wait longer to ensure global variables are set
* = wait 2000 ms
* Wait a little longer so that Alaankwa can initialize
* global plugin variable stores plugin state and variables
* NextGenerationWait has to be 2 to start us off. 1 is too low, as 1 is the trigger for building the new station
* setup new data structure and init it
* data structure version
* plugin initially enabled
* $sec = get sector from universe index: x=20, y=0
* $sec = find a random sector: startsector=[SECTOR], jumps=200, owner=[Phanon]
* skip if $sec-> exists
* $plugin.Vars[1] = [FALSE]
* Corporation has HQ built
* Corporation money. Here we set the starting cash.
* $plugin.Vars[3] = 15000000
* Corporation name
* Corporation HQ Object
* init and reinit are run every time the game loads
* interval is 1min
* Use this area to process special instructions when the plugin is toggled on
* Use this area to process special instructions when the plugin is toggled off
* The event script is called every interval
